snippet.title: Boulderoid (Dos game 1994)
snippet.description:
Boulderoid is a puzzle game published by MacroHead & MicroBrain, developed by CodeWraith Software, MacroHead & MicroBrain.
It's a clone of Boulder Dash.
It offers various functions such as game editor, cave(level) editor, graphics, players and so on.
You can choose one of two graphics modes (original, blderoid).

By the way, in blderoid mode, the main player seems to be naked..
